unnormalised: The price of tomatoes has increased to ₹80/kg, and onions are being sold at ₹60 per kg at the local market; it is approximately 20% higher compared to last week. Many shoppers are reducing their purchase quantity to around 250 gms per item due to the rising costs.
normalised: The price of tomatoes has increased to rupee eighty per kilogram, and onions are being sold at sixty per kilogram at the local market; it is approximately twenty percent higher compared to last week. Many shoppers are reducing their purchase quantity to around two hundred and fifty grams per item due to the rising costs.
